about_me.des: We're Anime lover and we want to help Fansub. First, we look at the most classic problem for Fansub it is encoding problem, for instance, encoding is complicated, subtitle sliding from frame to frame, subtitle invalid display and more. So, we made Konayuki Encoder fix all the problems and you can totally forget about it. In the future, we will bring the new tools to help Fansub as much as we can. ;)

projects.knyk1: Konayuki Encoder is Hardsub burn-in application, especially made for helping Fansub who get in trouble with encoding. (STOP DEVELOPMENT)
projects.knyk2: Konayuki Lefiya is Advanced SSA (.ass) subtitle comment converter for convenience of quality control (QC).
projects.knyk3: The successor of Konayuki Encoder with fully support 64Bit system resulting in performance improved up to 50%. | The main features is the ability to encode by queue. (multiple files) | The ability to save works as a project file for the next time. | Support  Intel, Nvidia and AMD GPU Encoder. | Preview the encoding video use to debug subtitle files. | The ability to select audio track from the multi-audio MKV file. And many more!

changelog.more: Read full changelog at our website!
changelog.title: New!
